description.p: Returns the specified number of leftmost characters from a field or value.

prototypes.prototype: Left as C (Text as C, NumberOfCharacters as N)

description.p: The number of characters to extract.
Returns the specified number of leftmost characters from a field or value.

discussion.p: The Left function extracts the specified number of leftmost characters from a field or value.

example.caption: Left() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Left(CompanyName,5) AS Expr1 FROM Customers =Alfre
